base_description: White desk with multiple drawers, rectangular shape.
part_description: The desk has six drawers, three on each side, and a central drawer beneath the tabletop. The drawers are rectangular and vary in size, positioned vertically on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the desk frame, supported by rail mechanisms. The central drawer is positioned to be accessed easily, while the side drawers provide additional storage, each fitting snugly into its designated slot within the desk structure.
external_interaction_description: The desk provides a flat surface for work or study, accommodating items like computers, books, and stationery. The drawers offer storage for organizing personal or office items, accessible by pulling the handles. It can be placed in an office or home setting, interacting with the surrounding furniture.
